name: The Portal of Volitional Surrender
fieldIntelligence: To activate a field that allows for a sovereign, conscious, and timely surrender to a higher intelligence or a more coherent emergent path. This Meta-Glyph combines the deep witnessing of the opportune moment (Ω38), the subtle perception of a greater intelligence at play (Ω11), and the courageous, volitional act of yielding one's own will (Ω43). It is the art of getting out of one's own way with profound grace.
